turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to place an order for some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One with ham, pepperoni, olives and extra cheese and the other with onions, bacon, pepperoni and green peppers and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 large pizzas with extra cheese, 1 ham, pepperoni, olives, 1 onion, bacon, pepperoni and green peppers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $50, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's all I wanted.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
